page.title: 09LOCAL HISTORY I
page.content:
CUMMERTREES
Cummertrees got its name because it was where people from Cumbria met with the local people. Cummertrees Village was built to house the workers from the Hoddam and Kinmount Estate . At one time, the whinstone houses were built in a square,which came to be called Parliment Square because people met to talk about politics there. These houses were pulled down,and nowadays only a wall remains. Cummertrees used to have its own railway station and petrol pumps,but these are no longer there.
